## Explore data

::: {.content-visible unless-format="html"}
_Note_ --- Interactive data table shown in html-document.
:::

```{r explore}
tbl <-
    datasets::mtcars |>
    dplyr::select(mpg, hp, cyl, gear)

if (knitr::is_html_output()) {
    reactable::reactable(tbl, searchable = TRUE, striped = TRUE)
} else {
    knitr::kable(tbl)
}
```
